column4: can someone help, if i dont get this sorted then i have lost out on a job opportunity i need wifi on my laptop so i can connect wireless instead of trying to get a wired connection !!!??
ubuttu:dont dont help,after updating to the new kernel my wireless stop working
-> post the results of  sudo lshw -C network;   iwconfig; ifconfig; cat /etc/network/interfaces
-> your driver for your wifi is not loaded,  also do not attempt to have both the wifi and your eth0 connected on same subnet and router
how to get it i loaded  again because the kernel stopped it, also i dont, i am connected and on ubuntu now, trying to get this problem sorted
i tried it done nothing || ubottu: as  stated i have looked at that page and it has not helped
-> read again, there may be instructions there how to load your driver
-> or you may google for how to load AR242 drivers
i will try google again, the problem is i already have the tutorial for it to work again but the site is down so when i go "wget {url of download}" the site is not avaliable
-> which ubuntu version you have? dont you have ath5k or ath9k ?
how can i tell , i no i have 8.10 thats about it atm
-> look for your ath9k or ath5k driver to see if those will work instead of madwifi
-> then try to use that ath5k
-> or you may even google for why ath5k may replace ath9k or vice versa
-> i dont know, its not released yet
